characters: The scene shows a driver in a car approaching an intersection. There are several large trucks parked on the right side of the road. A person is standing next to a motorcycle that is lying on the ground in the middle of the intersection. The person appears to be wearing a dark jacket and a light-colored helmet.
summary: The vehicle approaches an intersection with several large trucks parked on the right. As the vehicle gets closer, a motorcycle is seen lying on the ground in the middle of the intersection, with a person standing next to it. The driver will need to stop to avoid hitting the person and the motorcycle.
actions: The vehicle is initially moving forward at a constant speed as it approaches the intersection. As the motorcycle and person become visible, the driver will need to brake to avoid a collision. The driver is likely slowing down to assess the situation and determine the best course of action.
key_objects: 1) Right: Large trucks parked on the side of the road, medium distance, obstruct the view of the intersection. 2) Center: Motorcycle lying on the ground, short distance, immediate collision risk. 3) Center: Person standing next to the motorcycle, short distance, immediate collision risk.
